thread.title_full: NBA trade rumors: Latest news, updates, buzz on trade deadline day

author: Jordan Greer (jgreer@sportingnews.com)
title: NBA trade rumors: Latest news, updates, buzz on trade deadline day
text:
February 23, 2017 9:29am EST February 23, 2017 9:29am EST Everyone get to your respective NBA bunkers. Trade deadline day is finally here. Paul George and Carmelo Anthony. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 9:29 a.m. ET 
Updated at 9:29 a.m. ET 
Everyone get to your respective NBA bunkers. Trade deadline day is finally here. 
Wednesday turned into a bit of a staring contest between teams with no side willing to blink. Guys like Paul George, Jimmy Butler and Jahlil Okafor have been discussed in a number of rumors, but it remains to be seen whether they will actually be dealt. 
With only hours left before the 3 p.m. trade deadline, Sporting News will provide the latest news below. Let's have some fun. Latest NBA trade rumors, news, updates 
9:25 a.m. â€” Jahlil Okafor would prefer to go to the Bulls in a trade, ESPN's Marc Stein reports, but the Sixers will take the best deal that comes their way. It feels like a matter of when, not if, Okafor will be traded. The Sixers simply don't have room for Okafor in a crowded frontcourt, especially after they added Tiago Splitter in a deal with the Hawks . Watch This
